name: Minute Wizard
description:
2 minutes to explore and loot the world!

At the 60 second mark, the portal will re-open in the middle of the map.

Can you make it back with all your riches in hand?

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

WASD Key - Movement

Space Bar - Change Spell

Left Mouse Button - Cast a Spell

Right Mouse Button - Dash away

R Key - Restart game

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

LEVEL DESIGN: JON WU || DRAGONHAMMER

PROGRAMMING: MARLON GONZALEZ || TORCHBEARER

ART DESIGN: JOHN MATUCHA || RAIZO

MUSIC: "BAMBOO JUNGLE!"

"8 BIT SPACE GROOVE" || HEATLYBROS

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

WIP: BALANCING, SOUNDS
